oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.visualInformationNavigator.navigator.publicCommon.action
Interface ActionManager

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionManager
public interface ActionManager
extends java.io.Serializable

The Action Manager interface to be implemented by uptaker. Implementation of this interface is an optional parameter to our taskflow. It will be called co incorporate any uptaker action into node context menu.

getDnDActions

java.util.List<Action> getDnDActions(ActionManager.DnDType dndType,
                                     java.lang.String sourceVinId,
                                     ActionManager.VisualizationType sourceVisualizationType,
                                     java.util.List<DnDElement> source,
                                     ActionManager.VisualizationType targetVisualizationType,
                                     DnDElement target)
Get all drag and drop actions related to source and target.

Parameters:
dndType: - the type of drag and drop operation.
sourceVinId: - the uptaker's assigned VinId to the soruce vin
sourceVisualizationType: - the visualization type of the source vin.
source: - the list of DnDElements that are the source of the drag.
targetVisualizationType: - the visualization type of the target vin.
target: - the DnDElement that is the target of the drop.
Returns:
the list of available actions for that drag and drop operation.
